name: Zhihu Daily
description: Zhihu Daily is a simple customized style for [Zhihu Daily for PC](http://zhihudaily.ahorn.me) which is based on [Zhihu Daily](http://daily.zhihu.com/story).
additional_info: Changelog 1.1 May 22th, 2014 - update for the latest Zhihu Daily for PC. 1.0 March 31th, 2014 - first release of Zhihu Daily.
